column2: Abo umurongo ukaze mu bibanza bikomeye muri reta y'aba Taliban
column3: Aba Taliban batangaje abagize reta mfatakibanza muri Afghanistan, baca banamenyesha ko ico gihugu kigiye kugengwa n'amategeko ya Islam. Iyo reta, igizwe n'abagabo gusa, irimwo abakuru bakuru mu ndongozi z'aba-Taliban bamwe bazwi cane mu bitero ku ngabo z'abanyamerika mu myaka 20 iheze. Reta izoba irongowe na Mullah Mohammad Hassan Akhund, umwe mu bashinze uwo muhari, nawe asanzwe ari ku rutonde rw'abatemerwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu azoba umugabo atinyitse cane aronderwa na FBI arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi ba Haqqani. Aba Taliban bigaruriye igihugu nka cose mu ndwi zitatu ziheze, birukanye abari batowe n'abanyagihugu. Itangazwa ry'abagize reta n'intambwe ikomeye igana ku butegetsi bw'aba Taliban.  Ubwo butegetsi buzohangana n'ibibazo bikomeye , hadasigaye inyuma ico gukomeza no guha amaragamo ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu hamwe no kwemerwa mu makungu. Kare aba-Taliban bari bavuze ko bashaka gushinga reta irimwo impande zose . Ariko abashikiranganji bose batangajwe ku wa kabiri basanzwe ari indongozi zizwi z'aba-Taliban , kandi nta mugore n'umwe arimwo. Reta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko ''zifise  impungenge" inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bashiriye ahabona abagize reta yabo y'abashikiranganji b'abagabo gusa kandi irimwo abantu bafitaniye isano n'ibitero ku ngabo z'Abanyamerika. Ubushikirangani bw'imigenderanire bwa Amerika buvga ko buriko burihweza iryo tangazo ryo ku wa kabiri. Umukenguzamateka wa Amerika Lindsey Graham yavuze ko iyo reta mfatakibanza ari umurongo "w'abamenanzugi hamwe  n'abanyamacuniro". N'umwe  mu bakuru b'aba Republicans yiyamirije ingingo bavuga ko "itiyumviriwe neza"  yo kuva muri Afghanistan yafashwe na prezida w'umu Democrat Joe Biden. Mw'itangazo ku wa kabiri, ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire (State Department) bwavuze buti: "Twabonye ko urutonde rw'amazina yatangajwe rugizwe gusa n'abasanzwe ari abanywanyi b'aba Taliban canke abo bakorana kandi ata mugore arimwo. "Turatewe impungenge kandi na  kahise ka bamwe bamwe muri bo." Ribandanya rivuga ko ''Amerika izofatira aba-Taliban ku vyo bakora, atari ku majambo." Itangazo rivuga ko Amerika "Izofatira aba-Taliban  ku vyo biyemeje" vyo gutanga inzira itekanye ku banyamahanga n'abanya-Afghanistan bafise ivyangombwa vyo kugira ingendo, harimwo no ''kwemerera indege ubu ziteguriye kuva muri Afghanistan". Ribandanya rivuga riti: ''Twibukije kandi ko twiteze ko aba-Taliban bazokora ibishoboka kugira ubutaka bwa Afghanistan ntibukoreshwe mu kubangamira ibindi bihugu". ''Isi iriko ibirabira hafi."  Itangazo ryitirirwa indongozi kizigenza y'aba-Taliban Mawlawi Hibatullah Akhundzada ryabwiye reta gushira mu ngiro itegeko rya Sharia. Iryo tangazo ryasohotse mu rurimi rw'icongereza rivuga  ko aba-Taliban "bashaka imigenderanire ikomeye kandi imeze neza n'ababanyi n'ibindi bihugu ishingiye ku kwubahana no kuvugana" - ariko harimwo kugabisha ko bazokwubahiriza amategeko n'amasezerano  mpuzamakungu "adateye kubiri n'itegeko rya Islam n'ayandi mateka y'igihugu". Hibatullah Akhundzada ntarigera aboneka ahagaragara. Ubu nibwo butumwa bwa mbere buvuye kuri we bugiye ahabona kuva aba-Taliban bigaruriye ubutegetsi mu kwezi guheze. Hassan Akhund, umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha w'imfatakibanza , yarabaye umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire kuva mu 1996 gushika mu 2001, igihe uwo mugwi wari ku butegetsi. Azwi cane cane mu burongozi bw'idini muri uwo mugwi kurusha mu ruhande rwa gisirikare. Igenwa ryiwe ribonwa nko guheberanira, inyuma y'ivyavuzwe ko hoba harabaye gusubiranamwo hagati y'indongozi z'aba-Taliban z'umurongo woroshe na bagenzi babo b'umurongo ukaze. Umuvugizi w'aba Taliban, Zabihullah Mujahid, yagize ati:"Turazi ko abanyagihugu bari barindiranye igishika reta nshasha. Turishuye ku cipfuzo c'abo." Sarajuddin Haqqani, umushikiranganji mushasha w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, ni we arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi uzwi kw'izina rya Haqqani ufitaniye ubucuti n'aba Taliban, ukaba ari na wo uri inyuma y'ibitero vyahitanye abantu benshi muri ico gihugu cari kimaze imyaka 20 mu ntambara. Bitandukanye n'aba Taliban, umuhari wa Haqqani wose wiswe umuhari w'iterabwoba ukorera mu mahanga na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Abandi bagenywe harimwo Mullah Yaqoob nk'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, Amir Khan Muttaqi, uwo imigenderanire n'amakungu hamwe n'abari mu bashinzwe umuhari w'aba Taliban Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar na Mullah Abdul Salam Hanafi nk'ivyegera. Yaqoob n'umuhungu w'uwashinze uwo muhari akaba yaranabaye umuyobozi wawo wo mu rwego rwo hejuru Mullah Omar. Baradar yigeze gutwara ibiro vy'uwo muhari bijejwe politike, anahagararira ishirwa ry'umukono ku masezerano yo kuva muri ico gihugu na Amerika. Abajijwe impamvu ata mupfasoni n'umwe arimwo, Ahmadullah Wasiq, wo mu mugwi ujejwe imico mu ba Taliban, yabwiye umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Secunder Kemani ko abagize reta bose bataragenwa.

column2: Coronavirus: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana yifatiye ingingo ya Guma mu rugo
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo, yifatiye ingingo ya guma mu rugo mu kiringo c'iminsi 14 ku mpanuro yahawe n'abaganga, inyuma y'aho umwe mu bamwegereye yapimwe agasanga yaranduye wa mugera coronavirus. Iyo ngingo yamenyeshejwe mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na leta y'igo gihugu ejo ku wa gatandatu, rivuga riti: "Uno munsi nta mugera bamutoye, ariko yahisemwo iyi ngingo mu kwinengesera". Iryo tangazo rivuga ariko ko Perezida Akufo-Addo azobandanya akora akazi muri ico kiringo cose, ariko akurikiza ingingo zose zijanye no kwikingira Covid-19. Hagati aho, iryo tangazo ntirimenyesha nimba  uyo muntu amwegereye ari umukozi canke ari uyo mu muryango wiwe. Gushika ubu, igihugu ca Ghana giharurwamwo abanduye coronavirus 19.388, kikaba ari kimwe mu bihugu vyo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye. Muri abo, 117 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara, nayo 14.330 nabo bakaba bayikize. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji n'amahinguriro muri ico gihugu co mu burengero bwa Afrika, Carlos Kingsley Ahenkorah, yaratanze imihoho hirya y'ejo ku wa gatanu kubera yarenze ku mategeko ya guma mu rugo inyuma y'aho apimiwe agasanga yaranduye.

column2: Intambara yo muri Ukraine: Russia iriyamiriza US iyagiriza ubumenja
column3: Uwuserukira Uburusiya muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Anatoly Antonov ariyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe n'umuvugizi wa Pentagone John Kirby aho yagirije Perezida Vladimir Putin ko akora ibikorwa vy'ubumenja mu gitero kuri Ukraine. Ku wa gatanu mw'ijoro, Kirby yahatswe gukorora amosozi igihe yabaza ingene umuntu wese "akomeye mu mutwe" yoshobora gusigura amabi akorwa n'Uburusiya. Yongeyeko ati: "Sinibaza ko hari umuntu yokwishimira na gato urugero rw'ubukozi bw'ibiki n'ubugome [vya Putin]". Mu butumwa bwiwe yacishije ku mbuga hwaniro, Antonov avuga ko amajambo ya Kirby ari "igitutsi kandi ko adashobora kwihanganirwa". Ati: "Bimaze kuba umugenzo hano ko abategetsi bashikiriza amajambo ashingiye ku binyoma bitangwa n'abategetsi ba Ukraine". Uyu muserukizi w'Uburusiya avuga kandi y'uko Amerika idashaka ko intambara yo muri Ukraine irangira. "Ikiraje ishinga John Kirby na bagenziwe ni uko inganda za gisirikare za Amerika ziyegeraniriza amafaranga mu kwikurako ibirwanisho vyazo bishaje". Arangiza avuga ko Kirby "yatakaje icizere nk'umutegetsi wa Amerika, mu gukoresha ibitutsi vyo mw'ibarabara".

column2: U Burundi ngo naho atawurwaye coronavirus arahaboneka "buriteguye"
column3: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi, Gaston Sindimwo, yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu citeguye kurwanya coronavirus naho ata wanduye uwo mugera arahaboneka. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu bike kw'isi gushika uyu munsi hataraboneka umugwayi wa coronavirus. Ariko mu ntumbero yo kuzitira bataronerwa, leta yaramaze gufata ingingo zo gukumira ico kiza. Muri izi harimwo guhimiriza abantu kudafata ingendo, baba abinjira mu gihugu canke abashaka gusohoka hamwe no guhagarika uruja n'uruza rw'indege mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Basaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kwegerana aho bishoboka, ndetse no gukoranako. Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu Gaston Sindimwo yadusobanuriye ko ari nayo mpamvu mu nama nshikiranganji y'uno munsi baramukanije badakorana mu ntoke nk'uko bimenyerewe. Yagiranye ikiganiro na Florentine Kwizera, ushobora kwumva aho hejuru.

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Pablo Escobar: hatowe amafaranga menshi yanyegejwe mu nzu y'uyu yahoze acuruza ibiyayuramutwe
column3: Umuhungwabo w'uwahoze ari rurangiranwa mu rucuruza rw'ibiyayuramutwe Pablo Escobar avuga ko yatoye isashe yuzuye amafaranga angana na miliyoni 18 z'amadolari yari anyegeje mu ruhome rw'imwe mu nzu za se wabo. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Colombia aho bashobora gusanga aya mafaranga mu nzu asanzwe abamwo mu gisagara ca Medellín. Avuga ko atari bwo bwa mbere atoye amafaranga mu bibanza se wabo atashaka kubonamwo umuntu, ni mu gihe uyu Escobar avugwa ko yasize anyegeje amamiliyoni menshi mu mazu yiwe. Yapfuye mu mwaka wa 1993 arashwe n'abapolisi. Igihe yagera kw'isonga ry'umwuga wiwe, Escobar yaramenyekanye ko yari umuntu agira indwi atunze kw'isi yose. Kuva apfuye, hagumye hari ibihuha i Medellín  ko Escobar yanyegeje amatungo yiwe, inyuma y'imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo arwana na leta ya Colombia yashaka kumurungika muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zariko ziramuhiga. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Colombia Red+ Noticias ko yatoye kandi n'imashini yo kwandika, amatelefone yakorana naza satellite, ikaramu y'inzahabu, kamera hamwe na firime y'amafoto atari bwogeshwe. Ati: "Igihe cose naricara mu cumba co gufungura, nkaraba muri parikingi y'imodoka, nama mbona umugabo yinjira muri ico kibanza agaca agenda". "Umunuko wari muri ico kibanza wari uteye ubwoba. Umunuko wasumvya incuro ijana uwuva mu kintu capfuye". Nicolás Escobar, yari asanzwe aba muri iyo nzu mu myaka itanu iheze, avuga ko amwe mu manoti amaze imyaka mirongo yari yaboze ku buryo atokoreshwa. Mu kiganiro, avuga ko kenshi yama aherekeza se wabo, kandi ko igihe kimwe yigeze kunyuruzwa n'abantu bariko barondera aho Escobar yari yinyegeje. Ati: " Naraborejwe igufa mu kiringo c'amasaha indwi yose. Bamwe mu bakozi banje bakubiswe umusumenu". Escobar yavukiye ahitwa Rionegro muri Colombia mu 1949, akaba yatanguje akarwi kacuruza ibiyayuramutwe mu gisagara ca Medellín mu myaka ya 1970. Mu myaka uru rudandazwa rwari rukomeye cane, aka karwi niko kinjije mu buryo bwa magendo hafi ibice 80% vy'urumogi rwinjijwe muri Amerika. Ubutunzi bwiwe bwamutumye ashirwa ku rutonde rwa Forbes (ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru y'ubutunzi) rw'abatunzi ba mbere w'isi mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi yose. Igihe Amerika isohoreye umutahe wo kumurondera, Escobar yararwanye intambara kugira ntashobore gufatwa, aho akarwi kiwe kakoze ibitero ku banyapolitike, abapolisi n'abamenyeshamakuru. Amaze gufatwa mu 1991, Escobar yapfungiwe mw'ibohero yubatswe ku ntumbero we nyene yatanze, yari yataziriwe Katederari (Cathedral), ayo yabandanije agenzura urudandaza rwiwe i Medellín. Muri rusangi, Escobar aharurwako abantu bagera ku 4000 bishwe. Ariko rero, amamuko yiwe y'umuntu yicisha bugufi yatumye amenyekana mu Banyakolombiya batari bake bari bamushigikiye kubera amafaranga menshi yabaha, mbere akaba yarafashije uturere dukenye mu gisagara ca Medellín.

column2: Tanzania: Patiri imbere y'ubutungane yagirizwa vya mfura mbi yakoreye abana
column3: Umupatiri wa Ekleziya Katolika mu buraruko bwa Tanzania yarengukishijwe imbere y’ubutungane yagirizwa ivya mfura mbi yakoreye abana, nk’uko bivugwa n’igipolisi. Aba bana ni abanyeshure bo kuva mu mwaka wa gatandatu gushika mu mwaka wa mbere w’ishure ryisumbuye bariko bitegurira gusangira, abandi gukomezwa. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Abepiskopi muri Tanzania, Patiri Charles Kitima, avuga ko Ekleziya izokorana n’ababijejwe kugira ngo ubutungane bukore muri uru rubanza. Patiri Kitima ati: “Twavuze ko turindiriye iyo ngingo [ya sentare] kugira ngo izindi ngingo zifatwe...ivyemezo ni bitangwe hanyuma nawe ahabwe akaryo ko kwiregura, ico nico turindiriye. “Ni ngombwa ko amategeko akora igikorwa cayo kandi Ekleziya izokwifatanya n’ababijejwe kugira ngo abakorewe ikibi batunganirizwe”. Patiri Kitima yabwiye BBC ko muri rusangi Ekleziya Katorika irwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana kuko isengero ritegerezwa kuba ikibanza c’amahoro kuri bose. Ati: “Reka twemere ko iki ari ikibazo kijanye na kamere ya nyene kubikora, dufise abapatiri barenga 3.000 muri kino gihugu ariko muri bo harimwo abo usanga bafise utunenge n’intege nke, ivyo bibaho”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko iki ari akabi kabishe kuko gituma abavyeyi n’abana bagira impungenge nyinshi, abana iyo bagiye mu bikorwa nk’ivyo baba bizeye ko bagiye guhura n’umuntu yari kubarera muri mutima. Ati: “Rero iyo bakorewe ibitabajanye ni ibintu bibabaza cane. “Twebwe nka Ekleziya turababazwa n’ingeso mbi z’umuntu umw’umwe ziteye kubiri kubiri n’ico twategerezwa kwubaka, kwubaka umuntu mu mico myiza. “Ureste ko iki ari igicumuro kandi kibabaza Imana, gifise n’ingaruka mbi ku bana, rero ni ngombwa ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko kw’isi abantu nk’abo bahari, ko rero dutegerezwa gufashanya nk’abanya muryango mu guhindura izo ngeso, kandi tugatanga inkuru iyo hari ikintu nk’iki kibaye. Avuga ko uburyo bwo gutanga inkuru muri Ekleziya butomoye, kuva hasi gushika hejuru ku Nama nkuru y’abepiskopi, abantu b’abahinga mu gutorera inyishu ibibazo nk’ivyo.

column2: DR Congo: Inama nshingamateka yabogoje umukuru wayo asanzwe acuditse na Kabila
column3: Inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeje ko umukuru wayo abogozwa. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho inama nshingamateka isohoreye urwandiko rwo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Jeanine Mabunda, asanzwe acuditse cane na Josepf Kabila, hamwe n'abo bakorana, bakagirizwa uburongozi bubi. Iyi ni intsinzi kuri Perezida Félix Tshisekedi amaze igihe atumvikana n'uwo yasubiriye, Perezida Kabila. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, haradutse akaguma mu nama nshingamateka, biba ngombwa ko igipolisi kiza kubanguranya abari bashamiranye. Jeanine Mabunda, umukuru w'iyi nama nshingamateka, ni akadasohoka na Josepf Kabila, akaba yabogojwe n'amajwi 281 kuri 200. Niwe mukenyezi wa mbere yari yizigiwe ngo arongore inama nshingamateka ya Congo, ariko mu nyuma ico cizere bari bamuhaye kikaba cagiye gisubira inyuma. Abashingamateka begamiye ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi bamwagiriza ko ahengamira ku ruhande rwa Kabila mu ngingo ziwe, arico gituma yabogojwe. Wewe arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Aya matora yatumye abashingamateka benshi baja ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi. Ubu rero, ni akanya keza kuri we ko gushira mu ngiro imigambi yatangaje ku wa Mungu uheze, harimwo gushinga reta nshasha avuga ko yomworohereza gukorera bikwiye abanyagihugu ba Congo. Iri bogozwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ni uruhombo rudasanzwe kuri Perezida Kabila, yashikirije ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 18 arongoye iki gihugu. Hagti aho, n'aho yari yashikirije ubutegetsi amaze gutsindwa mu matora, yagumanye ibibanza vyinshi mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka z'uburere.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Ferdinand Omanyala: Uwambere mu kunyaruka muri Africa yamara agwana n'igitutu ca kahise
column3: Ferdinand Omurwa Omanyala  ashobora kuba ariwe mugabo anyaruka cane muri Afrika inyuma yo guca umuhigo  kuri uwo mugabane ku metero 100 ariko uwo munya-Kenya aremera ko igihano  yafatiwe mu 2017 kubera ugufata imiti itemewe ku bakinyi kigumiza icijiji ku vyo ashikako. Yirutse amasekunda  9,77 mw'ihiganwa rya Kip   Keino Classic ryabaye ku wa gatandatu i  Nairobi  aca avanaho umwanya wari hejuru w'ama sekunda 9.85 wari wagizwe n'umunya-Afrika y'Epfo Akani Simbine mu kwezi kw'indwi. Uwo mugabo w'imyaka 25 yabwiye BBC Sport Africa ati: "Iyo nirutse nkagira umwanya mwiza cane, abantu baramvuga ariko jewe ndiraba - nta wundi n'umwe nirukira." Umwanya yagize umutuma aba umugabo agira umunani ku rutonde rw'abanyaruka cane kw'isi mu bihe vyose, n'ubwo yarangije ubwa kabiri inyuma y'umunya-Amerika Trayvon Bromell nawe yarushije aho wenyene yari ageze ku masekunda 9,76. Inyuma yo gutangura umwuga wiwe w'ubunonotsi mu 2016, Omanyala  yamaze amezi 14 ari mu bihano inyuma yo gupimwa bigatorwa ko yafashe imiti itemewe, avuga ko wari umuti w'ububabare yafashe. Asigura ko "yagize ivyago vy'ivyashitse. Wari umuti w'ububabare hanyuma bija kugaragara ko warimwo steroid , ivyo nivyo vyatumye mba uwo ndi uyu munsi." "Vyantumye kugira inguvu zo kwivyukiranya, gukomera gusumba - kuko n'ibihe ata munonotsi n'umwe yokwifuza gucamwo - kandi n'icigwa c'uko utofata icarico cose kandi ko utokwizera umuntu n'umwe mu nkino z'ubunonotsi." "Vyarabaye ibihe bigoye cane kuri jewe ariko reka dushire kahise muri kahise. Dutange imbabazi, twibagire hanyuma dukomeze. Jewe ndi umuntu mbaho nkurikije aho ibintu bigeze. Rwabaye urugendo rutoroshe inyuma yo gutangura mu 2016 -imvune, hanyuma gufatirwa ibihano - ariko ivyo biri muri kahise. Ubu turiko turubaka kazoza." Omanyala yemeza ko ashobora kunyaruka kurusha akaba avuga ko yihaye kuzoja munsi y'ama sekunda 9,70 - ikintu kimaze gushikwako gusa na rurangiranwa Usain Bolt wo muri Jamaica, mugenziwe Yohan Blake n'umunya-Amerika Tyson Gay. Uwo yahoze ari umukinyi wa rugby hanyuma agahinduka umwirutsi yumva ko ashobora kwiruka cane kuruta aho mbere akegereza umuhigo w'isi wa Usain Bolt w'amasekunda 9,58. Yavuze atwenga ati : "Ntaho kugarukira hariho". Uwu mwaka wamuziye neza kuko yashitse mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma mu nkino za Olympic ziwe za mbere, hanyuma agaca umuhigo wo muri Kenya ku masekunda 10,00 wanabaye umwe mu myanya itanu yiwe myiza mu mezi indwi aheze. Avuga ati: "Nagumye ntera imbere mw'isiganwa ryose nagize kuko nagize amahiganwa menshi uyu mwaka." "Ivyo nivyo ngiye gukomeza mu mwaka kandi nzotangura hakiri kare nko mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Bisigura ko mu kwezi kwa gatandatu nzoba ngeze ku myanya myiza cane." Yizigiye kuba icitegererezo ku bandi Mu gihugu kizwi cane ku banonotsi biruka ku birere biri hagati na hagati na birebire, Omanyala ubu yifuza guha intege urunganwe rushasha rw'abanya-Kenya biruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters). Avuga ati: "Nsenga nsaba cane ko mu myaka itanu iri mbere twoba dufise ba Omanyala benshi, abana benshi bazi kwiruka, kuko ni je ndi uwa mbere nagwanye kugira nshike kw'isonga." "Ndazi ko hari abantu benshi bashobora kwiruka cane, mu mupira w'amaguru na  rugby, none dushoboye kuronka abirutsi 10, Kenya hari ico yoba ishitseko. "Ubu baremera ko bishoboka kuko abenshi mu babigerageje bacibwa intege n'abavyeyi babo canke abandi bantu bavuga ngo ''nta na hamwe ushobora gushika wiruka ibirere bigufi muri Kenya'. Ariko ubu abantu baremera ko bishoboka. "Ubu nshaka gutanguza umugwi w'abiruka ibirere bigufi hanyuma nshishikarize abakiri bato kwimenyereza turabe aho bazoshika." Umwe mu bemera ko Omanyala, Simbine n'abandi nk'abo nka Enoch Adegoke wo muri Nigeria, yashitse mu gice ca nyuma c'imetero 100 mu nkino za Olympic, bashobora kuba icitegererezo ku banya-Afrika ni uwahoze yitaba inkino za Olympic akagira n'umuhigo w'isi Justin Gatlin. Uwo munya-Amerika, yahejeje inyuma ya Omanyala ku wa gatandatu, avuga ati: "Abanya-Afrika barafise impano zo gushobora kwiruka. "Isi izi abanya-Afrika nk'abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa ariko ubu hariho abazi gutera umuhunda  (javelot), abasimba, abiruka ibirere bigufi (sprinters), nibaza ko Afrika ubu yeretse isi ko idafise abashoboye kwiruka ibirere birebire gusa." "Ivyo ni ibintu bikomeye kuba Afrika ifise abo bose. Jewe kuva kera nemera ko Afrika ifise ico iha isi kuruta ivyo imaze gutanga gushika ubu." Abagabo 10 ba mbere banyaruka kw'isi gushika ubu

column2: CECAFA: Tanzania 4 - 0 Burundi, umumenyereza ati 'badusumvya ubuhinga'
column3: Mu rukino rwa kabiri rw'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'abagore mw'ihiganwa rya CECAFA, umurwi w'u Burundi ntiworohewe, kuko urukino rwarangiye utsinzwe na Tanzania ibitsindo 4-0. Umumenyereza w'uyo murwi aremera ko barushijwe, ariko akavuga ko bagiye kwikosora mu zindi nkino zimirije. Uburundi buri mu murwi B kumwe na Tanzania, Sudani y'Epfo, na Zanzibar, u Burundi buri mu kibanza ca kabiri n'amanota atatu, inyuma yo gutsinda Zanzibar ibitsindo 5-0 mu rukino rwa mbere rwabaye ku wa gatanu. Mu kiganiro yahaye abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'aho u Burundi butsindiwe na Tanzania, Daniella Nibimenya, umumenyereza w'umurwi w'u Burundi, avuga ko ataco batagize. Ati: "Bakinye neza kandi bakurikije impanuro twabahaye, n'aho twatsinzwe twakinye neza". Avuga ko Tanzania yabatsinze kubera abakinyi bayo bazinanye kuko basanzwe bakinana kuva kera kandi ko babasumvya n'ubuhinga. Urwo rukino rwari rurindiriwe n'abakunzi b'umupira w'amaguru benshi, na rirya abenshi mu bagize umurwi w'u Burundi harimwo abasanzwe bakina mw'ihiganwa rya Tanzania. "Twakinye aho tugeza, kandi haburana babiri hagatsinda umwe, ni ibisanzwe. Twatsinzwe uno munsi, ariko ihiganwa rirabandanya, tuzorurwana gushika ku kanyuma". Nibimenya avuga ko bagiye kwikosora kugira ngo baze bavyifatemwo neza mu nkino ziri imbere. Uburundi bwiteze guhura na Sudani y'Epfo mu rukino rutegekanijwe ejo ku wa gatatu isaha umunani mu masaha y'i Dar es Salaam. Iryo higanwa rya CECAFA ririko ribera i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania ryatatanguye ku wa 16 z'uku kwezi rihuza imirwi umunani iva muri Uganda, Kenya, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Burundi, Djibuti Zanzibar na Sudani y'Epfo.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: South Africa yizeye kuronka incanco z'umugera wa coronavirus mu kwezi kuza
column3: Africa y'Epfo yizigiye kuronka incanco za Covid-19 mu kwezi kuza, ariko ivyo biterwa 'uko ibiganiro n'ibigo bizikora bizoba vyagenze neza, nk'uko bivugwa n'umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu. Reta ifise ihangiro ryo guha urucanco nibura 67 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu bose-n'ukuvuga abarenga hafi miliyoni 40.3-gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka kugira haboneke ubudahangarwa kuri iyo ndwara. Umushikiranganji ajejwe amagara y'abantu Zweli Mkhize yavuze ko gushika bamaze kuronka incanco zikwiye kugira bakingire 10 kw'ijana vy'abanyagihugu. Yavugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku wa mungu ko gutangura gutanga izo ncanco bitegerezswa ''gukorwa mu buryo bwihuta''. Yanavuze kandi ko reta iriko iravugana n'ibigo vyose bikora izo ncanco hamwe n'ivyemera guzitanga vuba kuruta ibindi. Africa y'Epfo cabaye igihugu ca mbere co muri Africa cashikanye abamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19 barenga umuliyoni. Mu minsi iheze muri ico gihugu haratowe ishami ry'uwo mugera rinyaruka kwandukira gusumba, vyibazwa ko arico catumye igitigiri c'abandura ciyongera. Ubu Africa y'Epfo yemeza abantu 1.100.748 bamaze kwandura umugera wa Covid-19, abashika 29.577 bamaze gupfa n'abakize 903.679 kuva ico kiza cadutse mu kwezi kwa gagatu guheze.

column2: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
column3: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: Nkundabantu : umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yari nde?
column3: Ejo ku wa gatandatu niho umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yaririmbana na mugenziwe Alfred Nyandwi,  yitaba Imana i Bujumbura. Abo baririmvyi babiri bari bagize umurwi abatari bake bari bazi nka "Alfred na Bernard", bakaba bagiye kumenyekana cane ku rukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwiswe NKUNDABANTU. Alfred ati: " Nsigaranye umubabaro udasanzwe kuko yari umugenzi twari tumaranye imyaka n'imyaka, twavuye kure dufatana urugendo rwari rutugejeje aho tugeze, none ansize ndi umwe". Abo baririmvyi bompi basanzwe bava mu miryango y'abacuraranzi ba kera, banaririmvye indirimbo zamenyekanye cane. Bernard Ndoreyicimpa, mwene Mijuriro Mathias  na Ntahonkuriyer Valerie yavutse mu 1986, avukira muri Komine Isare ku mutumba wa Gishingano uhanamiye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Co kimwe na mugenziwe Alfred, Bernard yavukiye mu muryango w'abacuraranzi bahoze mbere baririmba mu murwi w'igihugu wari uzwi nka NAKARANGA. Alfred yabwiye BBC ati: "Uretse ko turi abavyara, twempi tuva mu miryango y'abacuraranzi, kuko papa wanje yakorana na se wa Bernard muri Nakaranga, n'aho bamaze gukukuruka". Se wiwe, Mijuriro Mathias yararirimvye indirimbo abatari bake bibuka nk'izitwa "Abanywa inzoga twaragowe", "Mariya Makurata", "Akarimi", "Musore uri muhira", n'izindi. Alfred Nyandwi yabwiye BBC ko batanguye kuvuza umuziki bari hamwe mu mwaka wa 1998 mu gihe bari bahungiye mu gisagara kubera intambara z'urutavanako zari iwabo mu Gishingano. Avuga ko batanguye kuririmbira mw'ibarabara mu ntumbero yo kurondera ingene bobaho inyuma y'aho ibintu vyabo binyagiwe, n'amazu yabo akabomorwa n'intambara. Ati:  "Ariyo mpamvu twaciye dufata umwuga wo kuririmbira mw'ibarabara, tuvugiriza abantu mw'ibarabara kugira ngo baduhe udufaranga, eka mbere twaranavugiriza n'indya kugira ngo dushobore kubaho". Avuga ko babaye muri ubwo buzima mu kiringo kitari gito, gushika aho buke buke batangura kuza baraja kuvugiriza mu bunywero mu bibanza bikomakomeye vy'i Bujumbura cane cane biri ku nkengera y'ikiyaga Tanganyika, nka za Saga Plage, Petit Bassam n'ahandi. Ati: "Aho hose twavugiriza mu bubare tuvugiriza ingenzi, abantu bari mu karuhuko bakaduha udufaranga duke duke, maze tugashobora kuronka ico dutanga mu miryango yacu kuko twari tukiri abana". "Twatanguye turi nk'abantu bita aba 'mendiants', ba ntahonikora". Alfred avuga ko batanguye kwinjira muri Studio mu 2006, babifashijwemwo na Tanganyika Studio, baca bategura urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwabaye rurangiranwa biciye cane cane mu maradiyo. Urwo rukurikirane rwiswe NKUNDABANTU  rwabatumye bamenyekana cane, runabashikana mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo za DR Congo, Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, Uganda, Kenya, Cameroun, Benin, Tchad,  Chine na  Brésil. Bernard apfuye be na mugenziwe Alfred bariko bategura gusohora urukurikirane rwabo rwa kabiri bari barahejeje gutunganya, bise BIRATANGAJE, bakaba bategura kurusohora muri uno mwaka wa 2020. Nta wuramenya icamwishe ariko Alfred avuga ko yari amaze ikiringo c'amezi umunani agendana indwara, akaba yapfuye ejo ku wa gatandatu bamutwaye kwa muganga.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Qasem Soleimani: Abantu baje ari benshi i Baghdad mu muhango wo kumwunamira
column3: Isinzi ry'abantu ku murwa mukuru wa Irake, Baghdad, bitabiriye umuhango wo guherekeza umugaba w'ingabo wo muri Irani, Qasem Soleimani, yiciwe mu gitero c'indege za Amerika ku wa kane. Soelimani niwe yari kw'isonga mu gutegura ibikorwa vya gisirikare vya Irani mu karere k'uburasirazuba bwo hagati, kandi Irani yararahiye ko itegerezwa guhorera urupfu rwiwe. Ikiziga ciwe vyitezwe ko gisubizwa muri Irani kugira ashingurwe mu muji yavukiyemwo. Iryo sinzi ry'abantu i Baghadad ryari ryaje kandi kwunamira Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, umugaba w'ingabo w'umunye Irake yatwara umugwi ushigikiwe na Irani wa Kataib Hezbollah. Uwo mugwi niwo wavuyemwo utugwi tuzwi nka Popular Mobilisation units, dufashe mu mugongo imigwi y'abarwanyi muri Iraki yiganjemwo iyishigikiwe na Irani. Abaje kwunamira abo bishwe, imbere y'uko umuhango utangura, baza barazungagiza amabendera ya Irake n'ay'imigwi y'abarwanyi baririmba bati "urupfu kuri Amerika". Bakoze urugendo rwakwiragiye mu mabarabara, bamwe bitwaje amasanamu ya Soleimani abandi bitwaje ay'umukuri w'ikirenga wa Irani, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei. Amakuru avuga ko ibiziga vy'abanye Irani bishwe bica bijanwa muri Irani ku mugoroba, ico gihugu kikaba cashizeko iminsi itatu yo kugandarira uwo mu jenerale yagandaguwe. Ipfubwa ryiwe rizoba kuwa kabiri mu muji yavukiyemwo wa Kerman mu ntara yo hagati muri Irani. Ariko hari abanye Irake bo banezerewe barigina mu mabarabara ya Baghdad bumvise amakuru y'urupfu rwa Soleimani. Yagirizwa kuba yarateguye ibikorwa vyo guhasha abantu bari mu myiyerekano mu mutekano yo gusaba umuzo wa demokrasi mu mezi aheze. Televiziyo ya leta ya Irake ku wa gatanu yavuze ko habaye ikindi gitero c'indege mu gihugu, amasaha 24 nyuma y'iyicwa rya Soleimani. Umwe mu basirikare ba Irake yabwiye ibiro ntaramakuru Reuters ko abantu batandatu biciwe muri ico gitero kindi, cagabwe ku rukurikirane rw'imiduga y'abarwanyi bo muri Irake mu masaha ya kare mu gindo co kuwa gatandatu. Umuvugizi w'isigirikare ca Amerika yahakanye ivy'uko boba ari bo bagize uruhara muri ico gitero kindi. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zavuze ko zarungitse abandi basirikare ibihumbi bitatatu mu burasira zuba bwo hagati gufasha mu gihe hogira ikiba kubera igitero c'indege cagabwe.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
column3: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

column2: Coup d’Etat muri Burkina Faso : Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henry Sandaogo Damiba ni nde?
column3: Umuhari 'Le Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration' urongowe na Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damila. Ariko none uwo akuye ubutegetsi bwa prezida Roch Marc Kabore ni nde? Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba w'imyaka 41, n'umusirikare mukuru mu bagwanira ku butaka muri Burkina Faso. Yahora arongoye intara ya gatatu ya gisirikare irimwo na Ouagadougou, umugwa mukuru. Colonel Damiba yahoze ari mu basirikare bacungera umukuru w'igihugu, yahoze acungera ubuzima bwa Blaise Compaore, imbere y'uko bavana mu 2011 inyuma y'igumuka ry'igisirikare. Mu 2015, ari mu basirikare bakuru biyamirije itembegazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ico gisata nyene c'abasirikare bacungera umukuru w'igihugu, urwo rwego rukaba rwaciye rufutwa. Yarahamagawe nk'icabona mu rububanza kuko yari yavuganye umwanya muremure na Gen Djibril Bassole. Kuva mu 2016, ari imbere mu ntambara yo kugwanya iterabwoba. Yaragiye mu mahugurwa nka yose ahariwe ibisata vya gisirikare bidasanzwe. Yarananditse n'igitabo citwa:  Armées ouest-africaines et terrorism : réponses incertaines? Paul-Henri Damiba yararongoye ibisata vyinshi vya gisirikare harimwo  Dori na Ouahigouya, intara yiziziwe n'ibitero. Prezida wa  Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration biganye na Emmanuel Zoungrana, yahagaritswe itariki 8 z'uku kwezi kwa mbere 2022 yagirizwa gushaka kubangamira   umutekano w'igihugu.

column2: Kubera iki tutakiramba nko mu myaka iheze?
column3: Mu kiringo hafi c'ibinjana bibiri, ikiringo co kubaho cariyongereye ku rugero rudasanzwe. Mu myaka ya 1840, abantu ntibarenza imyaka 40 muri rusangi. Ariko iterambere mu bijanye n'imfunguro, ubuvuzi, uburaro hamwe n'isuku mu gihe  c'ihinduka muvyo amahinguriro vyatumye gushika mu ntango z'imyaka ya 1990, abantu bashobora kubaho hafi imyaka 60. Uko ikinjana ca 20 cagenda gitera kija imbere, uretse imyaka y'intambara, ibintu vyagumye bitera imbere mu vyo amagara y'abantu kuri bose n'ugukingira abana. Kuva mu myaka ya 1970,  habaye iterambere muvyo kuvura indwara z'imitima cane cane, bikaba vyabandanije bitera intambwe ku muvuduko munini. Icibonekeza ni uko kuva mu ntango y'ikinjana ca 21, imyaka y'ukubaho yiyongera gushika ku myaka 80 ku bagore, na 75 ku bagabo. Ivyo vyarabandanije uko, aho uko imyaka hafi ine iheze hiyongerako uwundi mwaka wo kubaho. Ariko rero ivyo vyarahagaze giturumbuka - canke vyaragabanuye umurindi, kuva mu mwaka wa 2011. Ni ivyo akanya gato canke bizobandanya uko biri? Mu ntango abahinga bibaza ko ari ingorane nto. Nivyo ko umwaka wa 2015 wabaye umwaka udasanzwe, aho ibitigiri vy'abapfuye vyaduze - urushana rwari rubi cane kubera akaranda k'ibicurane kabiciye bigacika. Ariko rero ubu biraboneka ko ata vyo gushikuza birimwo. Ibiharuro vya nyuma biherutse gushikirizwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ibarura, vyerekana ko n'aho hari iciyongereyeko hagati ya 2016-2018 inyuma y'urwo rushana, haracari agahaze ugereranije n'imyaka y'imbere y'aho. Ingene ibintu biboneka ubu, bizofata imyaka 12 ku bantu baba mu Bwongereza kugira ngo imyaka yo kubaho ishobore kwiyongerako uwundi mwaka. Hari abavuga ko inyuma y'imyaka itari mike y'iterambere, abantu bashitse ku rugero ntarengwa rw'ukubaho kwabo. Umuntu wa mbere yabayeho imyaka myinshi  nk'uko impapuro zivyerekana ni umufaransakazi Jeanne Calment yapfuye afise imyaka 122 - ariko haciye imyaka irenga 20. Ubushakashatsi bwasohotse mu kinyamakuru Nature bwavuze ko imyaka ntarengwa y'ukubayo - kiretse abo bakeya cane nka ba madame Calment - ari hafi imyaka 115. Ariko hari ababihakana. Aho ni nk'umuhinga w'Umunyamerika mu biraba ibigize umuntu (généticien), David Sinclair, aherutse kwandika igitabo yise Lifespan (Imyaka y'ukubaho) aho avuga ko iyo uduhimba tw'umubiri w'umuntu dutuma abaho (genes) twongerejwe inguvu, abantu bashobora kubaho igihe kirekire. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, hari vyinshi vyerekana ko abanyagihugu b'Ubwongereza batashobora gushikana iyo myaka y'ukubaho. Akarorero, imyaka y'ukubaho mu Buyapani yariyongereye muri ino myaka iheze gusumba mu Bwongereza, muri ico gihugu kizwi ko abanyagihugu baco baramba gusumba abandi. Umuhinga mu bijanye n'ubusaza, Edward Morgan, avuga ko hari ibituma vyinshi, agasaba ko haba ibikorwa vyinshi vy'ubushakashatsi kuri ico kibazo. Ikigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza kiza carakoze makeya muri ayo. Icegeranyo casohoye mu mwaka uheze, kirashira ahabona ibituma bitari bike. Kimwe mu bituma bivugwa ni uko mu myaka iharurwa kuri mirongo n'iyindi iheze, ata kintu kinini cahindutse mu biraba ubuvuzi. Iyo abantu batishwe n'iki, harashobora kwaduka iyindi ndwara. Mu gihe igitigiri kitari gito c'abantu babandanya bikinga impfu ziva ku ndwara z'imitima na kanseri, igitigiri c'abahitanwa n'indwara zo mu mutwe catanguye kuduga. Hanyuma mu gihe isi iriko irarwana kugira ngo ishobore gupfupfahaza iyo ndwara - ivyo kuyirandurana n'imizi vyibagirwe - imyaka yo kubaho igenda igabanuka. Icibonekeza ni uko ibintu vyagiye vyunyuka mu bakene, kikavuga ko leta ibifisemwo uruhara kubera ingingo z'ugutubika umukanda zatumye uburyo bwakoreshwa mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu n'ukwitaho imibereho y'abanyagihugu bugabanuka.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa 14.07.2019: Coutinho, Hudson-Odoi, Pogba, Maguire, Neymar, Sane
column3: Umukinyi wo hagati wa Barcelona, Philippe Coutinho, yanse kwinjira muri Manchester United, aho ni mu gihe bivugwa ko bishoboka ko asubira muri Liverpool, ariko hakaba hari amahirwe menshi y'uko uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 ashobora  kugurwa na Paris St-Germain. (Express) Barcelona yijeje umufasha wa Coutinho ko ata mugambi ifise yo kugurisha uyo mukinyi, ariko akavuga ko umukiriya wiwe yoba ariko ashaka kugurishwa ku yindi mirwi ya Espanye. (Sky Sports) Bayern Munich ntirota iheba kurondera umusatirizi wa Chelsea, Callum Hudson-Odoi w'imyaka 18, bikaba vyitezwe ko itanga ayandi mahera agera ku miliyoni 45 z'amapawundi muri iyi ndwi. (Mail) Manchester United ntizoshobora kugurisha muri Real Madrid umukinyi wayo wo hagati, umufaransa Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26, mu gihe uyo murwi wa Espanye womurondera igihe cagenewe kugura abakinyi kirangiye ku wa 8 z'ukwezi kw'umunani. (Mirror) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Leicester, umwongereza Harry Maguire w'imyaka 26 - asanzwe ariko aronderwa na Manchester United ku giciro c'imiliyoni 75 z'amapawundi  - yabwiye uwo murwi ko yipfuza kugenda. (Mail) Maguire yagiriza Leicester ko iriko isaba amafaranga arenze urugero, ni mu gihe imiliyoni 70 z'ama pawundi zimaze kumutangwako na Manchester United hamwe na Manchester City ariko iramwimana. (Sun) Umusatirizi w'umunyabrezili Neymar w'imyaka  27, abandanya asaba ko yokwisubirira muri Barcelona, akavuga ko ico aguma yibuka gusumba ibindi vyose ari intsinzi ya Barca y'ibitsindo 6 kuri 1 ca  Paris St-Germain mu 2017. (Mail) Uyo mukinyi wa PSG, uwa mbere yaguzwe amahera menshi kw'isi, yagiye kwunyura ibintu mu gukwiragiza ireresi irimwo isanamu yiwe yambaye impuzi ya Barcelona, yakurikijeko ubutumwa bwo mw'isezerano rya kera muri Bibiliya. (Goal.com) Umukinyi wa Tottenham akina hagati, Christian Eriksen w'imyaka 27 asanzwe kandi akinira  Danemark, ashobora kubandanya akinira uyo murwi kubera habuze uwundi murwi ufise uburyo bukwiye kugira ngo ushobore kumugura. (Guardian) Liverpool yinjiye mu gitigiri c'imirwi iriko irondera umusatirizi wa CSKA Moscow, Fedor Chalov  ku miliyoni 20 z'amapawundi. Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, Chelsea na Manchester United nazo nyene zikaba zishinze ijisho uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 21. (Mirror) Tottenham ibandanya irondera umukinyi wo hagati  wa Real Betis Giovani lo Celso w'imyaka 23 asanzwe kandi akinira n'umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Argentina.  Ku ruhande rwayo, Betis ishinze ijisho ku mukinyi wo hagati w'umufaransa, Nabil Fekir afise imyaka 25, akaba asanzwe akinira Lyon. (Football.London) Arsenal yatanze ayandi mafaranga angana n'imiliyoni 25 z'amapawundi ku mukinyi w'inyuma wa Celtic, Kieran Tierney w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho uyu murwi wo muri Ecosse wankiye igiciro c'imiliyoni 15 z'amapawundi zari zatanzwe na Arsenal mu kwa gatandatu. (Mail) Daniel Sturridge yahawe akaryo ko kunagura umwuga wiwe mu murwi Bologna wo mu Butaliyano, inyuma y'aho uyo musatirizi w'umwongereza w'imyaka 29 aviriye muri Liverpool. (Express) Arsenal iriteguye guhangana na Tottenham hamwe na Juventus mu kurondera umukinyi wo hagati wa AS Roma, Nicolo Zaniolo w'imyaka 20. (Calciomercato) Umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Manchester City, Leroy Sane, ntariko arwanirwa na Bayern Munich yonyene - uyo mudagi w'imyaka 23 ariko arwanirwa n'amahinguriro atatu ahingura ibirato vy'abakinyi. (Sun) Liverpool ivuga ko ata na kimwe iravugana na Real Madrid ku musatirizi w'umunyasenegali, Sadio Mane w'imyaka 27, n'aho umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru rya Senegali, Saer Seck, avuga ko uyo murwi wo mu gihugu ca Espanye woba umaze kumutangako igiciro. (Liverpool Echo) Ibiganiro bigeze kure hagati ya Atletico Madrid na Napoli  kugira ngo igure umukinyi w'inyuma akomoka muri Albania, Elseid Hysaj w'imyaka 25, asanzwe kandi ariko aronderwa na Manchester United. (Football Italia) Dinamo Zagreb ivuga ko ishobora kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati, Dani Olmo w'imyaka 21 akomoka muri Espanye, abandanya aronderwa na Manchester United.  (Manchester Evening News) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Everton, umunyasenegali Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 29, avuga ko amaze kwumva ibihuha bivuga ko ashobora kwimukira muri Paris St-Germain, ariko ko ikimuraje ishinga ubu ari ihiganwa ry'igikombe rihuza imirwi ya Afrika. (Sport Witness)

column2: Jeanne Gapiya - Covid niyahera tuzosanga hari benshi bahitanywe na Sida
column3: Jeanne Gapiya, umwe mu bazwi cane mu kurwanya Sida mu Burundi, avuga ko kwandura no kurwara Sida bishobora kwiyongera cane mu Burundi n'ahandi kuko uburyo bwo kubirwanya bwagabanutse cane kuva hateye ikiza ca Covid-19. Madame Gapiya ari mu bantu ba mbere bemanze ko bagendana umugera wa Sida mu Burundi mu myaka ya 1980,  igihe ibijanye n'uwo mugera vyari bikiri nk'ibitavugwa. Ishirahamwe ryiwe ryo gushigikira abagendana umugera wa Sida n'abarwaye iyo ndwara (ANSS)  rimaze hafi imyaka 30 kandi arashima aho we n'abandi bakora nkawe bari bagejeje igikorwa co kurwanya Sida. Madame Gapiya, atakiba mu Burundi igihe cose, avuga ko muri ino minsi yagiyeyo agasanga abarwayi ba Sida bamerewe nabi cane. Agira ati: "Nabonye umumama [umuvyeyi] aje kutwitura, yari amaze iminsi mu bitaro... nja kumuraba mbona umenga ni umwana w'imyaka nka  15. "Kubera dusanganywe ikigo gifasha abana barwaye cane , dushobora kuba turagumije, tubaha ivyo barya tubaha imiti gushika aho basubira kumera neza... "Ntangura kubwira abakozi nti jana urya mwana. Bati 'eka si umwana, ni umu mama w'abana 2'". Ibigo  birwanya Sida bisanzwe biha abarwayi bavyitura infungurwa zikenerwa cane kugira baronke intege zo kurinda iyo miti. Gapiya rero avuga ko yasanze ubu hari ubukene bw'ivyo kurya  kuko "uburyo twahora turonka ntabwo tukironka ngo tubafashe". Arongera ati: "Nagiye mu Kirundo, nsangayo uwundi muvyeyi tutazi ko tuzorokora,  afise igituntu akagira n'umugera, n'ibintu tutaheruka. "Ivyo vyose biterwa n'uko abantu bashonje kandi natwe ata buryo dufise bwo kubaha ivyo twahora tubaha". Madame Gapiya avuga ko imigambi mpuzamakungu yahora ibaha uburyo ubu yabuhindukirije mu kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19. Jeanne Gapiya avuga ko kuva habaye izi ngorane isi yose  irimwo z'ikiza ca Covid-19, gupima  umugera wa Sida bimaze kugabanuka ku rugero rwa 36%. Muri uwo mwanya  bisigura ko abagendana umugera batabizi bariko baranduza abandi. Agira ati: "Nitwagira imana n'ico kiza Covid tukagikira, tuzosanga twarasubiye inyuma, twarabuze abantu benshi cane". Ubundi avuga ko Uburundi bwari mu bihugu biteye imbere mu kurwanya Sida aho muri rusangi hagati ya  70 na 80% y'abategerezwa kuja ku miti  bayironka. Gusa urwo rugero ruracari hasi ku bana, rungana na 30%. Gapiya avuga ko abashikana ijwi kure ari ukubandanya basemerera kuko n'aho intambwe imaze guterwa, Uburundi n'ibindi bihugu na cane cane vyo muri Afrika y'ubuseruko n'iyo mu burengero ngo bikiri inyuma. Imiti igezweho ntirabishikamwo kandi abarwayi bayikenera kuko bishika bakananirwa n'iyo bari basanzweko. Avuga ko  we agira "amahirwe yo kuyironka kuko umushingatahe wanje akora muri Nations Unies [ONU]". "Uko siko ibintu vyategerezwa kugenda".

column2: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
column3: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.
